snippet: Quarterback Philip Nelson was arrested in Mankato in connection with an assault on a linebacker for Minnesota State University, Mankato.
abstract: Rutgers University quarterback Philip Nelson is arrested in Mankato, Minn, and charged with third-degree assault on Minnesota State University linebacker Isaac Kolstad, who is in critical condition.
lead_paragraph: Quarterback Philip Nelson was arrested in Mankato in connection with an assault on a linebacker for Minnesota State University, Mankato.

headline.main: Rutgers Player Is Charged With Assault in Minnesota
